name: Rolling Train
description:
"Crazy Train" is a puzzling, train-oriented agile puzzle game. To Cross Mountains and deliver goods safely to the destination, there are many obstacles and difficulties on the way to the destination. You need to complete the track splicing before the middle and small trains arrive, so that the train can pass through the current location smoothly, otherwise the small trains will roll over.

Game features:
There are many checkpoints, which make people want to stop. There are more than 300 levels, the more difficult it will be.
The terrain is rich and colorful. The journey is lonely and lonely. The rich scene design makes you forget the sadness of the journey.

The operation of the game is simple but difficult to control, but it tests the brain. But be careful not to roll over!
publishers: Beijing Bochuang wuxian Culture media co
